issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://9animetv.to/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2F9animetv.to%2F) ### Comment Username: @visiblyannoyedkitten > AdGuard used to block all ads and cancel any attempts of a website to redirect me to another site. HOWEVER, for some reason it’s not doing that anymore!! > On the website I linked (9anime.to) if I try to click ANYTHING it will redirect me to any number of countless scam websites. It opens up a new browsing window, and takes me to a completely different page/site. > This hasn’t ever been a problem for me before, because AdGuard wouldn’t allow them to take me anywhere — but all of a sudden AdGuard stopped blocking them! HELP!! > > I’ve spent the last day and a half trying to figure out what can be done. I’ve updated, made sure all filters are active and on, and tried updating the app several different times too. NOTHING works. When I click the spinning arrows in the top right of the screen, eventually (after I wait forever while it says it’s updating) it gives me the error “Filter update error” and stops. I’ve tried four separate times, just sitting here staring at those circling arrows until the error message pops up. I CAN’T GET IT TO WORK. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/ShoZJmt.jpg)

issue.title: feedclick.net
issue.body:
# 죄송합니다. 해당 웹 사이트는 애드쉴드(AdShield, Inc)에 의해 감염되었습니다.

안타깝게도 이 웹 사이트는 안티 애드블록 전문 회사인 애드쉴드의 서비스에 의해 보호받고 있어 일반적인 애드블록 규칙로는 처리가 까다롭습니다.
애드쉴드는 대한민국 정부의 기술 창업 지원 프로그램으로부터 최대 2년에 7억원을 받습니다.

이러한 기록은 [여기](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+)에서 검증하실 수 있습니다.
대한민국 정부의 지원 사실은 [여기](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777)에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.

## 유저스크립트 설치
[microShield 유저스크립트](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield)를 설치하여 애드쉴드 광고를 차단하시길 바랍니다.
한국어로 작성되어 있는 설치 가이드라인은 [이 URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.ko.md)를 방문하여 확인해주세요.


## 그래도 문제가 있으신가요?
유저스크립트를 사용했을 때 발생하는 문제는 [이 이슈 트래커](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues)로 알려주세요.
기타 문제는 [이 곳](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues)으로 알려주세요.
GitHub 이슈를 사용하시기 어렵다면, filters@adguard.com 로 문의해주세요.

comment.body:
It's caused by one of the third-party filters - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/153825#issuecomment-1594423147

You can try to add this rule to user rules:
```adblock
chillx.top#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'devtoolsDetector', 'noopFunc')
```

issue.title: Google Feed Missed ads
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.0.910

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

Google Feed on far left screen

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. If I refresh filters and then refresh my Google feed it will get most ads, but some game ads still show up.  There needs to be both an increase in refreshing filters and a way to not miss some of those ads. 

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://megapeer.vip/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmegapeer.vip%2F) ### Comment > Доброго времени суток. > На сайте https://megapeer.vip/ сверху в шапке появлятся блок разватной рекламы. Раньше ( с месяц назад примерно) ее не было и сайт успешно фильтровался. А сейчас фильтрация на нем принудительно отключена в AdGuard не мной. issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://megapeer.vip/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmegapeer.vip%2F) ### Comment > Доброго времени суток. > На сайте https://megapeer.vip/ сверху в шапке появлятся блок разватной рекламы. Раньше ( с месяц назад примерно) ее не было и сайт успешно фильтровался. А сейчас фильтрация на нем принудительно отключена в AdGuard не мной. Я пытаюсь установить ползунком фильтровать рекламу на этом сайте, страничка обновляется и фильтрация снова становится не активной. > Пожалуйста, можно что нибудь с этим сделать? > Версия AdGuard самая свежая (бета 7.13.1 (build 4278, CL 1.11.111) > С момента как все было нормально и до того как перестало фильтровать, настройки программы не менял. Браузер Fiefox и така же происходит и в Хром браузере ### Screenshots

pull_request.title: Bump semver from 7.3.8 to 7.5.3
pull_request.body:
Bumps [semver](https://github.com/npm/node-semver) from 7.3.8 to 7.5.3.
Release notes

Sourced from semver's releases.

v7.5.3

7.5.3 (2023-06-22)

Bug Fixes

  • abdd93d #571 set max lengths in regex for numeric and build identifiers (#571) (@​lukekarrys)

Documentation

  • bf53dd8 #569 add example for > comparator (#569) (@​mbtools)

v7.5.2

7.5.2 (2023-06-15)

Bug Fixes

  • 58c791f #566 diff when detecting major change from prerelease (#566) (@​lukekarrys)
  • 5c8efbc #565 preserve build in raw after inc (#565) (@​lukekarrys)
  • 717534e #564 better handling of whitespace (#564) (@​lukekarrys)

v7.5.1

7.5.1 (2023-05-12)

Bug Fixes

  • d30d25a #559 show type on invalid semver error (#559) (@​tjenkinson)

v7.5.0

7.5.0 (2023-04-17)

Features

  • 503a4e5 #548 allow identifierBase to be false (#548) (@​lsvalina)

Bug Fixes

  • e219bb4 #552 throw on bad version with correct error message (#552) (@​wraithgar)
  • fc2f3df #546 incorrect results from diff sometimes with prerelease versions (#546) (@​tjenkinson)
  • 2781767 #547 avoid re-instantiating SemVer during diff compare (#547) (@​macno)

v7.4.0

7.4.0 (2023-04-10)

Features

  • 113f513 #532 identifierBase parameter for .inc (#532) (@​wraithgar, @​b-bly)
  • 48d8f8f #530 export new RELEASE_TYPES constant (@​hcharley)

Bug Fixes

... (truncated)

Changelog

Sourced from semver's changelog.

7.5.3 (2023-06-22)

Bug Fixes

  • abdd93d #571 set max lengths in regex for numeric and build identifiers (#571) (@​lukekarrys)

Documentation

  • bf53dd8 #569 add example for > comparator (#569) (@​mbtools)

7.5.2 (2023-06-15)

Bug Fixes

  • 58c791f #566 diff when detecting major change from prerelease (#566) (@​lukekarrys)
  • 5c8efbc #565 preserve build in raw after inc (#565) (@​lukekarrys)
  • 717534e #564 better handling of whitespace (#564) (@​lukekarrys)

7.5.1 (2023-05-12)

Bug Fixes

  • d30d25a #559 show type on invalid semver error (#559) (@​tjenkinson)

7.5.0 (2023-04-17)

Features

  • 503a4e5 #548 allow identifierBase to be false (#548) (@​lsvalina)

Bug Fixes

  • e219bb4 #552 throw on bad version with correct error message (#552) (@​wraithgar)
  • fc2f3df #546 incorrect results from diff sometimes with prerelease versions (#546) (@​tjenkinson)
  • 2781767 #547 avoid re-instantiating SemVer during diff compare (#547) (@​macno)

7.4.0 (2023-04-10)

Features

  • 113f513 #532 identifierBase parameter for .inc (#532) (@​wraithgar, @​b-bly)
  • 48d8f8f #530 export new RELEASE_TYPES constant (@​hcharley)

Bug Fixes

  • 940723d #538 intersects with v0.0.0 and v0.0.0-0 (#538) (@​wraithgar)
  • aa516b5 #535 faster parse options (#535) (@​H4ad)
  • 61e6ea1 #536 faster cache key factory for range (#536) (@​H4ad)
  • f8b8b61 #541 optimistic parse (#541) (@​H4ad)
  • 796cbe2 #533 semver.diff prerelease to release recognition (#533) (@​wraithgar, @​dominique-blockchain)

... (truncated)

Commits
  • 7fdf1ef chore: release 7.5.3
  • bf53dd8 docs: add example for > comparator (#569)
  • abdd93d fix: set max lengths in regex for numeric and build identifiers (#571)
  • e7b78de chore: release 7.5.2
  • 58c791f fix: diff when detecting major change from prerelease (#566)
  • 5c8efbc fix: preserve build in raw after inc (#565)
  • 717534e fix: better handling of whitespace (#564)
  • 2f738e9 chore: bump @​npmcli/template-oss from 4.14.1 to 4.15.1 (#558)
  • aa016a6 chore: release 7.5.1
  • d30d25a fix: show type on invalid semver error (#559)
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view
Maintainer changes

This version was pushed to npm by npm-cli-ops, a new releaser for semver since your current version.


[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=semver&package-manager=npm_and_yarn&previous-version=7.3.8&new-version=7.5.3)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) You can disable automated security fix PRs for this repo from the [Security Alerts page](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/network/alerts).

issue.title: Do not allow to run scheduled workflows in the forks

labels.name: Infrastructure
labels.description: Related to the repository infrastructure

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Problem description

When someone clones the filters repo, the scheduled workflows (AG Filters workflows) runs in his fork unnecessary.
They should only run in the source repositories in which they are integrated.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://9animetv.to/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2F9animetv.to%2F) ### Comment Username: @visiblyannoyedkitten > AdGuard used to block all ads and cancel any attempts of a website to redirect me to another site. HOWEVER, for some reason it’s not doing that anymore!! > On the website I linked (9anime.to) if I try to click ANYTHING it will redirect me to any number of countless scam websites. It opens up a new browsing window, and takes me to a completely different page/site. > This hasn’t ever been a problem for me before, because AdGuard wouldn’t allow them to take me anywhere — but all of a sudden AdGuard stopped blocking them! HELP!! > > I’ve spent the last day and a half trying to figure out what can be done. I’ve updated, made sure all filters are active and on, and tried updating the app several different times too. NOTHING works. When I click the spinning arrows in the top right of the screen, eventually (after I wait forever while it says it’s updating) it gives me the error “Filter update error” and stops. I’ve tried four separate times, just sitting here staring at those circling arrows until the error message pops up. I CAN’T GET IT TO WORK. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/ShoZJmt.jpg)

comment.body:
Не повторяется с вашими настройками. Это гугловая реклама?
Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение ~60 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.

comment.body:
Hi!
The issue is caused by `Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts `. 
Please add `@@||ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/$domain=bodybuilderbeautiful.com` to User rules, or turn-off this filter. 
@ryanbr Could you please take a look?
